item.title: Homelab
item.description: Category Details Subject Personal homelab server Who Willem De Bie What A Raspberry Pi-based server hosting various services (DietPi OS) Where My home Why To learn, experiment and self-host services. Realizations I use my Raspberry Pi 4 to self-host a number of different software applications. 1. item.title: Memory Tracker (PHP Project)
item.description: Category Details Subject Thomas More PHP Project. Who Willem De Bie, Maciej Chuchra, Pierina Sabina Lopez Monserrate, Egemen Alkan, German Novykov, Stjepan Raguz, Muhammad Zubair What A PHP web application for patients of dementia Where Thomas More Why To learn PHP, teamwork and developing a professional web app. View Memory Tracker here: https://project.trackermemory.be/. Realizations Power of Laravel: Working with PHP Laravel, I appreciated its elegance and power. Its MVC architecture, security features, and database migration made the development process smoother and more efficient.

item.title: LAMP Stack (Linux Webservices)
item.description: Category Details Subject A LAMP stack (Course: Linux Webservices) Who Willem De Bie What A simple web application hosted with Lighttpd, connected to a NodeJS API which interacts with a MongoDB database. Where Thomas More - Linux Webservices Why To learn webservices and secure, containerized stacks. Download my research paper about this here. Realizations Note: everything I realized with this project is documented thoroughly in my research paper. Flexibility of the LAMP Stack: The LAMP stack is not limited to its traditional components (Linux, Apache, MySQL, PHP).

item.title: Racu
